languages.text: "За все время нашего знакомства ты так и не уяснил{mf||а} одну простую вещь. Давать ответ или нет — мое решение, а не твое".
"After all this time, you still have not realised one simple fact about me — I decide whether or not I answer a question. Not you."
languages.original_text: "За все время нашего знакомства ты так и не уяснил{mf||а} одну простую вещь. Давать ответ или нет — мое решение, а не твое".

traits.locale_text: "After all this time, you still have not realised one simple fact about me — I decide whether or not I answer a question. Not you."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "After all this time, you still have not realised one simple fact about me — I decide whether or not I answer a question. Not you."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "After all this time, you still have not realised one simple fact about me — I decide whether or not I answer a question. Not you."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "After all this time, you still have not realised one simple fact about me — I decide whether or not I answer a question. Not you."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我们在一起这么久，你却依然没有意识到一件很简单的事情：决定要不要回答问题的人是我，不是你。”
languages.original_text: "After all this time, you still have not realised one simple fact about me — I decide whether or not I answer a question. Not you."

traits.locale_text: “我们在一起这么久，你却依然没有意识到一件很简单的事情：决定要不要回答问题的人是我，不是你。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Después de todo este tiempo, aún no ha comprendido algo muy sencillo sobre mí: soy yo quien decide si responder o no a una pregunta. No usted».
languages.original_text: "After all this time, you still have not realised one simple fact about me — I decide whether or not I answer a question. Not you."

traits.locale_text: «Después de todo este tiempo, aún no ha comprendido algo muy sencillo sobre mí: soy yo quien decide si responder o no a una pregunta. No usted».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「これだけの時間が経っても、我に関する単純な事実にまだ気づいていないようですね。質問に答えるかどうかは我が決めることです。あなたではありません」
languages.original_text: "After all this time, you still have not realised one simple fact about me — I decide whether or not I answer a question. Not you."

traits.locale_text: 「これだけの時間が経っても、我に関する単純な事実にまだ気づいていないようですね。質問に答えるかどうかは我が決めることです。あなたではありません」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Malgré tout le temps que nous avons passé ensemble, il y a une chose que vous n'avez toujours pas comprise me concernant : je réponds aux questions que je veux. Ce n'est pas à vous d'en décider. »
languages.original_text: "After all this time, you still have not realised one simple fact about me — I decide whether or not I answer a question. Not you."

traits.locale_text: « Malgré tout le temps que nous avons passé ensemble, il y a une chose que vous n'avez toujours pas comprise me concernant : je réponds aux questions que je veux. Ce n'est pas à vous d'en décider. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Nach all der Zeit habt Ihr einen simplen Fakt über mich noch immer nicht verstanden – ich entscheide, ob ich eine Frage beantworte oder nicht. Nicht Ihr."
languages.original_text: "After all this time, you still have not realised one simple fact about me — I decide whether or not I answer a question. Not you."

traits.locale_text: "Nach all der Zeit habt Ihr einen simplen Fakt über mich noch immer nicht verstanden – ich entscheide, ob ich eine Frage beantworte oder nicht. Nicht Ihr."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bunca zamandır benimle ilgili en basit gerçeği kavrayamadın... Sorularına yanıt verip vermeyeceğime ben karar veririm. Sen değil."
languages.original_text: "After all this time, you still have not realised one simple fact about me — I decide whether or not I answer a question. Not you."

traits.locale_text: "Bunca zaman sonunda bile benim hakkımdaki basit bir gerçeği hâlâ öğrenemedin: Sorularına yanıt verip vermeyeceğime ben karar veririm. Sen değil."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
